channel.title: Help plz plz with run error
channel.description: it works then all of a sudden when i close the cmd run then i try to run it i get this error Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "ignore" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:449) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:499) at server.world.ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:142) at server.world.ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:45) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:64) Could not find the main class: server.Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . . :'( :(

item.title: Help plz plz with run error
item.dc:creator: @soldierslim2 soldierslim2
item.description:
@soldierslim2 wrote:

hadesflames:

Your trying to parse a none numeric string to a numerical variable (most likely an Integer) go to your shops.cfg and find “ignore” then fix that.

ty ty ty rep++ if i could it was on ym server i coded and it took for ever

Read full topic

item.title: Help plz plz with run error
item.dc:creator: @soldierslim2 soldierslim2
item.description:
@soldierslim2 wrote:

it works then all of a sudden when i close the cmd run then i try to run it i get this error
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError
Caused by: java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: “ignore”
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException.
java:48)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:449)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:499)
at server.world.ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:142)
at server.world.ShopHandler.(ShopHandler.java:45)
at server.Server.(Server.java:64)
Could not find the main class: server.Server. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .
:’(
